channel.title: Vim on Hui-Jun Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on Hui-Jun Chen

item.title: Vimtips
item.description: Tips for vim Vim-slime: Turning vim into a interactive script runner Vim-slime Install: add Plug 'jpalardy/vim-slime' in vim-plug Usage: To use with neovim terminal, add let g:slime_target = "neovim" to .vimrc. Default shortcut: <C-c><C-c> to send this paragraph (vip) to terminal. To use with tmux, add the following code to .vimrc: let g:slime_target = "tmux" let g:slime_paste_file = "$HOME/.slime_paste" For more details, go to .vimrc and Shelbyvimrc.
